quality_assessment: Excellent - Page comprehensively documents storage structure and benefits with accurate examples and valid cross-references
positive_aspects: Complete documentation of all storage directories from feature definition
Clear visual structure diagram with proper hierarchy
All four storage benefits documented with detailed explanations
Practical examples for accessing job data, finding sessions, and analyzing storage
Storage maintenance commands provided (cleanup, usage monitoring)
Migration guidance from legacy local storage
All internal cross-references validated as working
Good use of JSON examples for checkpoint and session formats
Troubleshooting guidance with actual shell commands
improvement_suggestions: Consider adding a note about the auto-generated nature of certain storage paths (e.g., timestamp suffixes)
Could include a diagram showing how multiple worktrees interact with shared storage
May benefit from performance characteristics section (e.g., JSONL streaming vs batch reads)

metadata.validation_focus: Check storage directories, organization structure, and benefits are documented
metadata.page_scope_notes: Page correctly focuses on storage_architecture.structure and storage_architecture.benefits. Does not document resume_locks (outside scope), does not document template registry (future feature).
